attributes.action: Make Joshua Hayes and Benjamin Hayes wash the dishes and not make the guests do them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many times i have gone to Josh and Bens house and i always find myself at the sink washing their dishes. I have come up with an idea to fund raise for a dishwasher to be installed at their home.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
